channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Industries

item.title: Bonsdag Industries Pvt. Ltd
item.description:
Bonsdag Industries pvt ltd. is the India's largest manufacturer of lifts, elevators and elevator machines. Bonsdag is dedicated to providing the safest, most reliable solutions in the industry.
Bonsdag Industries pvt ltd. is an independent and progressive company providing a wide variety of services, including lift installation, modernization and maintenance. Bonsdag is dedicated to providing the safest, most reliable solutions in the industry. It was established under the able guidance of Mr. Naresh Bhardwaj, Founder & CEO, who is having 25 Years of Experience and Expertise.
We offer installation and maintenance of dumbwaiters, passenger lifts, stairlifts, goods lifts, car lifts,hospital lifts, and capsule lifts. Our experienced engineers can also install car lifts, and landing doors, LED indicators, audible warning indicators, non-slip floors, specialised handles, and mirror panelling works.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Bagmati Plastic Industries (Pvt.)Ltd.
item.description:
We are a manufacturing unit situated in the Green Industrial Town of Biratnagar, mainly engaged in producing plastic household appliances, hdpe blown jars, pet preform and pet blown items.
Along with that we are manufacturing jerrycanes and containers for a decade now catering to vegetable ghee industries, edible oils and other eatables as well. From four years we have started manufacturing pet preforms and recently added pet blown jars, bottles to our ever growing list of packaging solutions mainly for food items and beverages.
Our group concerns are engaged in manufacturing plastic household furniture, edible oil packaging, knitted fabrics, plastic extrusion along with misc. imports of goods.
We are among leading manufacturers of plastic items in Nepal with our brand name BAGMATI Super Strong TM standing for quality and assurity to all our customers, dealers and end consumers. We have a strong dealer network throughout Nepal and eastern part of India and our products reach to almost every household at their nearest point of purchase.
Our Categories: 1. Buckets and Lids 2. Basins and Tubs 3. Jugs and Mugs 4. Dust Bins and Pans 5. Drums 6. Kitchen Utilities 7. Bathroom Utilities 9. Misc. Utilities 10. Cello Items 11. Pet Blown Jars and Bottles 12. HDPE Blown Jars and Jerrycanes 13. Pet Preforms 14. Newly Launched Print Series

item.title: Ashish Dairy Equipment Trading
item.description: We offer our clients a comprehensive range of Dairy Equipment that include : Bulk Milk Coolers(CHILLING VAt), Storage Tank, Ice Cream Machine, Cream Separator, Cheese Vat & other milk testing equipments. We are in the business of manufacturing dairy machinery from last 7 years.

item.title: Aarti Strips Pvt Ltd.
item.description: Aarti Strips (P) Ltd. located at Tankisinwari, Biratnagar is a fully steel manufacturing company associated with state of the art of facilities and NS 141, ISO 9001-2008 certified company. With the patronage of our esteemed customers we are poised for growth and expansion in various other locations, which has been conceived as our future plan. With our current installed capacity of 150000 (MTPA) manufacturing business we have an array of products to offer in flats, products we have an array of products to our customers ranging from Galvanised Plain/Galvanised Corrugated, Ridge GI & Colour Coated with Zinc Based Pre-Printed Galvanized Iron (PPGI),Profile Sheets,Tube,Shutter Patti. We create value as a manufacturer and deliver tailor made products to improve efficiency and reduce cost and time for our valued customers.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Utsav Overseas Pvt. Ltd.
item.description: Utsav Overseas Pvt. Ltd. was started in 2068/2/23(06/06/2011) by our chairman with a small thought in mind that people should walk this earth comfortably without worrying. We have been certified as an ISO 9001:2008 company on 9th May 29, 2014. We manufacture polyurethane Slippers and PVC shoes and distribute them all over Nepal and are in progress to export to other countries too. The company is governed by one value that is, never selling a product which is not fit for the people. We check each and every product with strict inspection at each and every step of the manufacturing process.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Asian Spices Nepal
item.description: Asian Spices & Food Packaging Udyog is known for its matchless product quality and innovative approach. Fine Masala is a quality product of Asian Spices & Food Packaging Udyog. Asian Spices are ground using the unique state-of-art Low Temperature Grinding(LTG) technology, which prevents the evaporation of volatile & delicate oils from spices. Fine Masala thus retain the original aroma and wholesome flavor of authentic spices. The complete assortment comprises of a variety of salt and pepper sprinkles and diverse range of whole , ground and blended spices. Fine Masala are packed in food grade metal-lined cartons, flexible laminates and convenient composite cans available in a variety of pack sizes. Earlier, spices were chosen, measured, pounded and mixed all in the kitchen. It took hours to prepare these recipes passed down by generations. Today, millions of homes enjoy the same authentic taste and aroma of traditional delicacies, with Fine Masala’s perfect blend of pure spices. These blends even bring the regions closer by providing the authentic taste of other regional cuisines, in the convenience of a pack, at home
item.dc:creator: superadmin
